about_the_game:
Hentai Tights is a jigsaw puzzle
This is a beautiful girl and puzzle game
You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.
The game will give you the original picture as a hint.
No time limit, and hope you can enjoy the game
just choose a puzzle and drag the fragments to get the picture together
You can enjoy beautiful pictures after playing the puzzle
The game has no restrictions, just complete the puzzle
-Good soundtrack

content_descriptors.notes:
Puzzle image contains nudity and sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
you can see the pictures after completing the jigsaw and pictures are naked and all characters are over the age of 18

name: Hentai Tights

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT520
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Hentai Tights is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.
